This PR is to fix a crash in HBHEPhase1Reconstructor as reported in #35785

The reason of the crash is an out_of_range index "soi" of the vector "inputCharge" in M3 reconstruction [1]
To prevent similar crashes in the future, a check of SOI has been added to HBHEPhase1Reconstructor
`maxTS >= 3 && soi > 0 && soi < maxTS - 1` 
If this check fails, an edm::LogWarning will be thrown and the corresponding channel will be skipped in HBHE reconstruction.

[1] [https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_12_2_0_pre1/RecoLocalCalo/HcalRecAlgos/src/HcalDeterministicFit.cc#L134](url)
